mapper.insert: INSERT TB_PTFOLIO_STUDY_FILE (STUDY_SEQ, FILE_PATH, FILE_PATHNM, FILE_FILENM, FILE_SIZE) VALUES (#{studySeq}, #{path}, #{pathname}, #{filename}, #{size})
